resources: O3Wallet Welcome to O3 Built for the NEO Smart Economy Secure & safe Stay up to date Are you ready to get started? 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 Wallet generated! Please take a moment to backup a copy of your Private Key. A simple, user-friendly smart wallet, designed for the smart economy. Send & receive NEO and ONT, claim GAS & ONG, and manage NEP5 Tokens all in one place. With latest security features, you can be sure your assets are safe and sound. Get the latest NEO news and discover new projects from right inside the app. Get started by setting up a new wallet or logging in with your private key. Continue Done Login With Existing Wallet â€” OR â€” Create a new wallet WIF or Encrypted Key Thank you for choosing the O3 Wallet!\n\n Here is the encrypted Private Key that you just created!\n\n You can use this key, along with the password that you created in O3 in the event that you are locked out of your wallet.\n\n%s\n\n To login follow these steps:\n\n1) Open the O3 App\n2) Select Login\n3) Either enter the text key or scan the attached QR Code\n4) Enter your password\n\nAnd you\'re in!\nThanks again for using O3! The app is requesting that you accept the transaction. Allow? 25% 50% 75% 100% You can now trade your favorite tokens straight from your O3 wallet with Switcheo Decentralized Exchange. Any token with the green trading icon is available for trading. It\'s fast, simple, and safe. Tap one and find out more! All done!\n\n Here is your new encrypted key! We recommend making a copy of the QR or text key and keeping it somewhere safe in case you lose access to your wallet.\n\n Don\'t forget your password or it won\'t work Back up Done O3 has recently improved its security and added multiple wallet functionality. To continue using the app, all wallets now require a safer encrypted private key with a passphrase. Verify your backup by saving your raw or encrypted key in another secure place.\n\n Your raw private key is not password protected, anyone with access to this private key can recover your funds.
